Literature.Author: De Zotti M, Biondi B, Formaggio F, Toniolo C, Stella L, Park Y, Hahm KS

Literature.Title: The peculiar N- and (-termini of trichogin GA IV are needed for membrane interaction and human cell death induction at doses lacking antibiotic activity.
Literature.Author: Tavano R, Malachin G, De Zotti M, Peggion C, Biondi B, Forrnaggio F, Papini E

Literature.Title: The rational search for selective anticancer derivatives of the peptide Trichogin GA IV: a multi-technique biophysical approach.
Literature.Author: Dalzini A, Bergamini C, Biondi B, De Zotti M, Panighel G, Fato R, Peggion C, Bortolus M, Maniero AL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=15 µM,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human dermal fibroblasts:50% Cell death=4 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=7.5-15µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 3096(MIC=>30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=>30µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918(MIC=>30µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=>30µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3089(IC50=6.25-12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3090(IC50=>12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3108(IC50=6.25-12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3114(IC50=6.25-12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3126(IC50=6.25-12.5µM),Fusarium oxysporum(no activity data),Rhizoctonia solani(no activity data),Aspergillus awamori(no activity data),Aspergillus parasiticus(no activity data),Aspergillus flavus(no activity data),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(EC50=5.8±0.41µM),Human epidermoid carcinoma A431(EC50=5.8±0.41µM),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(EC50=5.8±0.41µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(EC50=5.8±0.41µM),Human  glioblastoma T67(EC50=2µM)
